sentences.en: Richard had had a few sleepless nights.

sentences.en: Not in memory of Richard, my darling.

sentences.en: Richard must have forgotten about our meeting.

sentences.en: "I hope I 'm not disturbing you," Richard said awkwardly.
sentences.vi: "Tôi hi vọng không làm phiền anh," Richard nói một cách vụng về.

sentences.en: The ultramicroscope was developed by Richard Adolf Zsigmondy.
sentences.vi: Kính siêu hiển vi được phát triển bởi Richard Adolf Zsigmondy.
